file_content.text: Hawkins, take Rawaat and check the north tower. If the prisoners have it, let me know and I'll send reinforcements.
You bought us some valuable time, thanks. They're loading up the civilians now.
What are you still doing here? You've got to get that transport to those civis, or the prisoners will tear them apart!
Master Jedi, I could sure use your help. The prisoners are going from building to building, attacking everyone.
It's major, right? I'm sure glad to see you. The prisoners are going from building to building, attacking everyone.
Hope you're a quick shot with that blaster; the prisoners are killing everyone out there.
Worse, I've got civilians hiding in the prisoner intake yard. If the convicts find them, it'll be a massacre.
This is a prison. Where did civilians come from?
Civilians?
Many of the guards bring their families with them. It's good for morale, but now they're in danger.
Doesn't sound like a safe place to hide.
How'd they end up there?
When the riots started, it was the best we could do--I moved the guards' families there for protection.
What sort of idiot allows civilians on a prison facility?
You must've really messed up.
The guards are allowed to bring their wives and children. It's a long tour out here.
We're moving them offworld as soon as possible. I managed to scare up an armored transport.
Problem is there's an army of bloodthirsty convicts between the transport and the guards' families.
I'll clear the prisoners out of the area.
Leave that to me.
I knew I could count on you. Just be careful--they aren't showing anyone mercy.
What do you need from me?
It's not going to be pretty, I wish I could tell you otherwise.
Trust me, these prisoners haven't seen bloodthirsty.
I'm in the mood for violence.
Sometimes that's all they understand.
I need you to clear a path for the transport so it can get to those civis. The prisoners are going to throw everything they've got at you.
Honestly, I wouldn't send a womp rat on this suicide run... but I'm out of options. Can you do it?
Your transport is safe with me.
I'll take care of it.
The Force protects us, and I am its servant.
I'll take care of it.
I'll clear the way for your transport.
Affirmative.
I like my odds more than the womp rat's. I'll take care of it.
I've got this.
Thanks. With you on the job, I can concentrate on bringing other areas under control.
Point me to the transport, and I'll head out.
Where do I go?
The rioters already captured the main power station, so the transport's currently charging its power cells at our reserve.
You'll need to clear a path from there to the prisoner intake yard. That should buy enough time to get the civilians.
You do it. [Refuse quest]
Great. If any of those civilians get hurt, I'm holding you personally responsible.
Sorry, no time to talk now. I've got my hands full just keeping people alive.
